Constructor Detail

GraphableDataManager

public GraphableDataManager(SelectedGraph graph_)
DEFAULT CONSTRUCTOR initializes this object with a graph, xrange, yrange, and a list of colors.
Method Detail

redraw

public void redraw()
this is the top-level mechanism for redrawing the graph. 'redraw' constructs a RedrawInstruction object and passes it to the SelectedGraph that is associated with this GraphableDaraManager.

setPercentOffset

public void setPercentOffset(float o)
sets data offset. this offset is applied to each data block. the first data block is not offset, but all of the rest are 1 offset reletive to the previous block.

getPercentOffset

public float getPercentOffset()
gets data offset

calculateRanges

public void calculateRanges()
calculates x and y ranges based on data. this range is considered default, and will be maintained until setXRange() or setYRange() are called.

add

public void add(GraphableData d)
adds 'd' to this container (which extends Hashtable) using the String returned by d.getID() as the key, and the object as the value.

remove

public GraphableData remove(java.lang.String id)
removeds key/value pair where the key is 'id'

clear

public void clear()
removes all records. deselectes all Data objects.
